Njegoš: Teško je na ovom nivou...
"Ne bih komentarisao sebe i svoju igru, to ne volim"...

07 Nov 2019

Mladi vezista Crvene zvezde Njegoš Petrović dobio je šansu prvi put od starta u Ligi šampiona. Nije pokazao sve što ume, ali jeste da je potencijal i budućnost crveno-belih..."Na ovom nivou je vrlo teško, ali mislim da smo prvo poluvreme odigrali korektno. Dali su prvi gol na našu grešku, da smo uspeli da iskoristimo te dve šanse u prvom poluvremenu, utakmica bi išla u potpuno drugom smeru".
Zvezda se okreće borbi za treće mesto?"Slažem se potpuno, dolazi nam Bajern, posle toga idemo Olimpijakosu. Svaki meč idemo na pobedu, ako nas Bog pogleda mislim da ćemo dočekati proleće u Evropi".
Šta mora da se promeni protiv Bajerna da bi rezultat bio pozitivniji? "Kao što sam rekao, na ovom nivou šanse morate da iskoristite da biste došli do rezultata. Ne bih komentarisao sebe i svoju igru, to ne volim. Mogu da kažem da sam presrećan jer sam debitovao kao starter u Ligi šampiona, a na šefu, saigračima i navijačima je da daju svoju procenu".

Foto: MN Press

Njegos: It's difficult at this level ...
"I wouldn't comment on myself and my game, I don't like that" ...

07 Nov 2019

Young Red Star midfielder Njegos Petrovic got his chance for the first time since his start in the Champions League. He did not show everything he can do, but the potential is the future of the red and white ... "At this level it is very difficult, but I think we played the first half correctly. They scored the first goal on our mistake, that we were able to use those two chances in the first half, the match would go in a completely different direction. "
Star turning to fight for third place? "I agree completely, Bayern is coming to us. After that we go to Olympiakos. Every match we go to victory, if God looks at us I think we will welcome spring in Europe."
What must be changed against Bayern in order for the result to be more positive? "Like I said, at this level you have to use the odds to get results. I wouldn't comment on myself and my game, I don't like that. I can say that I'm overjoyed because I made my debut as a starter in the Champions League and at the boss. it is for teammates and fans to give their judgment. "

Photo: MN Press
